Class EnquiriesUI

public class EnquiriesUI extends Object

      Parameters:

      attendee - Student object of attendee who wishes to edit enquiry

    • replyToEnquiry

      protected static void replyToEnquiry(enquiry.ListOfEnquiries enquiries, filehandler.Database database, camppackage.Camp camp, enquiry.ReplyToStudent replies)

      Console prompt for committee member to reply to enquiry

      Commitee Member not allowed to reply to their own enquiry

      Parameters:
      enquiries - List of enquiries
      database - Database of Users
      camp - Camp committee member's camp
      replies - List of replies

    • printReplies

      protected static void printReplies(enquiry.ListOfEnquiries enquiries, camppackage.CampInfo campInfo, enquiry.ReplyToStudent replies, user.Staff staff)
      Print all enquiries and their corresponding replies onto console for all camps belonging to a staff
      Parameters:
      enquiries - List of enquiries
      campInfo - Database of Camps
      replies - List of replies
      staff - Staff who wishes to print all replies

    • replyToEnquiries

      protected static void replyToEnquiries(enquiry.ListOfEnquiries enquiries, camppackage.Camp camp, String userID, enquiry.ReplyToStudent replyToStudent, filehandler.Database database)
      System prompt for Staff/Committee member to reply to enquiries
      Parameters:
      enquiries - List of enquiries
      camp - Camp which receieved the enquiry
      userID - User identification of staff/committee member
      replyToStudent - List of replies
      database - Database of Users
